title: AI
description: Explore cutting-edge AI tools for designers and developers. From ChatGPT and Claude to Midjourney and DALL-E, discover AI-powered tools for image generation, copywriting, video creation, and creative work. Transform your design workflow with artificial intelligence.

resources.title: Adobe Firefly
resources.description: Generative AI integrated into Adobe Creative Cloud apps. Generate images, text effects, and more. *Adobe*

resources.title: ChatGPT
resources.description: ChatGPT is an AI-powered conversational assistant that can help with writing, coding, brainstorming, and more. *OpenAI*

resources.title: Claude
resources.description: Claude is an AI assistant by Anthropic that excels at complex reasoning, analysis, and creative tasks with a focus on safety and helpfulness. *Anthropic*

resources.title: Copy.ai
resources.description: AI-powered copywriting tool that helps you create marketing copy, blog posts, and more. *Copy.ai*

resources.title: DALL-E
resources.description: Generate, edit, and create variations of images using AI. Create realistic images and art from natural language descriptions. *OpenAI*

resources.title: ElevenLabs
resources.description: Generate realistic AI voices and speech. Create natural-sounding voiceovers in multiple languages. *ElevenLabs*

resources.title: Framer AI
resources.description: Generate and publish websites with AI. Start with text, customize with Framer's design tools. *Framer*

resources.title: Gamma
resources.description: Create beautiful presentations, documents, and websites with AI. No design skills required. *Gamma*

resources.title: Google Gemini
resources.description: Google's most capable AI model for text, code, image, and more. Multimodal AI assistant. *Google*

resources.title: Hugging Face
resources.description: The AI community building the future. Access thousands of AI models, datasets, and apps. *Hugging Face*

resources.title: Ideogram
resources.description: Free AI image generator that creates stunning visuals from text prompts in seconds. Excellent for generating images with text, logos, and creative designs.

resources.title: Jasper
resources.description: AI content platform for businesses. Create high-quality content faster with AI. *Jasper*

resources.title: Microsoft Copilot
resources.description: AI-powered assistant integrated across Microsoft products. Get help with writing, coding, and productivity. *Microsoft*

resources.title: Midjourney
resources.description: Create stunning AI-generated images from text descriptions. Perfect for concept art, illustrations, and creative exploration. *Midjourney*

resources.title: Perplexity
resources.description: AI-powered search engine that provides accurate answers with sources. Get instant, reliable information on any topic. *Perplexity*

resources.title: Poe
resources.description: Explore multiple AI chatbots in one place. Chat with ChatGPT, Claude, and other AI models. *Quora*

resources.title: Runway
resources.description: AI-powered creative tools for video editing, image generation, and more. Make anything you can imagine. *Runway*

resources.title: Stable Diffusion
resources.description: Open-source AI model for generating detailed images from text descriptions. *Stability AI*

resources.title: Synthesia
resources.description: Create AI videos with avatars and voiceovers in minutes. No cameras, microphones, or actors needed. *Synthesia*

resources.title: v0
resources.description: Generate UI components with AI. Create React components from text descriptions. *Vercel*
